title: Second life
creator_credit: Ximena Silberman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Ximena migrated to Australia in 2003. To migrate is to be born again. While enjoying her new life in Australia, she looks back at the friendships and life she left behind in Buenos Aires. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia
